nodes.text: Busted Blaster was a spacer's bar on Kiffex, located in Ven Karya Spaceport on the edge of the Trostlos Waste.

In 137 ABY, Cade Skywalker and Jariah Syn confronted the Uggli Brothers Gang in the bar and became entangled in a brawl. Responding to break up the fight, Kiffu Guardians stormed the bar. Caught up in the fight, Cade failed to realize that one of the Kiffu Guardians was his cousin, Ahnah, even turning his pistol onto her before Jariah stepped in between them.
